Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  945 PM Thu, Jul 5 to 5 AM Fri, Jul 6 No [2] trains between Chambers St, Manhattan and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr, Brooklyn  [4] [A] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service    [2] service operates in two sections

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  945 PM Thu, Jul 5 to 5 AM Fri, Jul 6 No [2] trains between Chambers St, Manhattan and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr, Brooklyn  [4] [A] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service    [2] service operates in two sections

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | 9:45 PM Thu, Jul 5 to 5 AM Fri, Jul 6
No [2] trains between Chambers St, Manhattan and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr, Brooklyn

[4] [A] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service

[2] service operates in two sections:
 1. Between 241 St and Chambers St and via the [1] to/from South Ferry
 • Trains run local in both directions between 96 St and Chambers St.
2. Between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Flatbush Av
• Trains from Flatbush Av skip Eastern Pkwy, Grand Army Plaza and Bergen St.

Travel Alternatives:
For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn take the [4] [N] [Q] or [R].

For Park Place, Fulton, Wall, Clark Sts, Borough Hall, Hoyt and Nevins Sts, use nearby [4] [A] [C] [N] [R] stations.

• Transfer between trains at 59 St-Columbus Circle [2] [A], Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority
[2] [A] [N] [Q] or Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [4] [N] [Q] [R].
• Transfer between [1] [2] and [R] ([N] after 11:30 PM) trains at South Ferry/Whitehall St.
• Out-of-system transfer is available between South Ferry [1] [2] and Bowling Green [4] stations
(request a transfer ticket).

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Description._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

LongDescription:
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad1] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

Summary._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  1045 PM Thu, Jul 5 to 5 AM Fri, Jul 6 Norwood-bound [D] trains run via the [N] from Stillwell Av to 36 St in Brooklyn

Description._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  1045 PM Thu, Jul 5 to 5 AM Fri, Jul 6 Norwood-bound [D] trains run via the [N] from Stillwell Av to 36 St in Brooklyn

LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE | 10:45 PM Thu, Jul 5 to 5 AM Fri, Jul 6
Norwood-bound [D] trains run via the [N] from Stillwell Av to 36 St in Brooklyn


No Norwood-bound service at Bay 50 St, 25 Av, Bay Pkwy, 20, 18 Avs, 79, 71, 55, 50 Sts,
Fort Hamilton Pkwy and 9 Av.

Travel Alternatives
For service to Bay 50 St, 25 Av, Bay Pkwy, 20, 18 Avs, 79, 71, take the [D] or [N] to New Utrecht Av-62 St* and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D].

For service to 55, 50 Sts, Fort Hamilton Pkwy and 9 Av, take the [D] or [N] to 36 St and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D].

For service from these stations, take the [D] to New Utrecht Av-62 St or Stillwell Av and transfer to a Norwood-bound [D].

*Free out-of-system transfer with MetroCard.

Note: Norwood-bound [D] trains make local stops at 53 St and 45 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

World Trade Center-bound trains [E] run express from 71 Av to Queens Plaza in Queens


Trains stop at Roosevelt Av.

For service to 67 Av, 63 Dr, Woodhaven Blvd, Grand and Elmhurst Avs, take the [E] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] local or Forest Hills-bound [R].

For service to 65 St, Northern Blvd, 46, Steinway and 36 Sts, take the [E] to Queens Plaza and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] local or Forest Hills-bound [R].

World Trade Center-bound [E].

LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE | 9:45 PM Thu, Jul 5 to 5 AM Fri, Jul 6
Jamaica-bound [F] trains are rerouted via the [E] after 47-50 Sts, Manhattan to Roosevelt Av, Queens


No Jamaica-bound service at 57 St, Lexington Av/63 St, Roosevelt Island, and 21 St-Queensbridge.

Travel Alternatives
• To 57 St, take the Jamaica-bound [F] to the nearby 5 Av/53 St [E] Station.
Or, transfer at 34 St-Herald Sq to an uptown [N] or [Q] for service to nearby 57 St-7 Av.
• To Lexington Av/63 St, take the [Q] via transfer at 34 St-Herald Sq.
• To Roosevelt Island and 21 St-Queensbridge, take the [F] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a
Coney Island-bound-bound [F].

• From these stations, take a Coney Island-bound [F] to 47-50 Sts and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].

Alternate travel note:
For 21 St-Queensbridge, consider nearby Queens Plaza.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.
